Reviews.Title: “Good hotel facilities, poor staff training”
Reviews.Author: sprintxoxo
Reviews.Content: recently stayed 3 nights regency inn suites memphis airport weekend hotel facilities bed cleanliness sound proofing complimentary parking microwave discomfort hotel guests night neither explanation nor apology call housekeeping twice fresh towels day checked phone rang 830 am morning call ignored knock door minute female housekeeping staff knock door 940 am male housekeeping staff checkout time noon poor hotel run coordination departments stay please double check payment receipt leave charges correct

Reviews.Title: “Nothing like jet engines roaring 100 feet from your bed.”
Reviews.Author: cab049
Reviews.Content: stay hotel couple days ago didnt services cant tell tv ate breakfast breakfast fine tv stations didnt fuzzy dont care sucked planes understand airport hotel located runway means 1030 pm planes start landing fedex goes hour hour half constantly stops morning planes start taking lasted 420 am starts sounding using vacuum roar bed shaking plane five minutes dont sleep plan sleep hotel rest hotel fine hotel able sleep cant failed

Reviews.Content: reviews unreasonable suspicious stayed night 2010 fine bug free clean 1000 hotels bar restaurant write home decent staff helpful shuttle airport excellent quick didnt 8900 night little pricey average hotel 50 bucks line imho literally feet active runway look window actually flight crews fedex aircraft taxied past 1000 feet thankfully night switched runways 10 pm bottom line average hotel little pricier look reviews suggesting bug look written people reviews suspicious maybe bugs found hotel clean visit
